title: Bundles of skills
excerpt: In  The First 20 Hours ,  Josh Kaufman makes the case you can learn a new skill (and be sufficiently good at it) with about 20 hours of deliberate practice.

children.text: If that holds true, that means that given 90-minutes of daily practice, you can pick up a new skill in as little as two weeks.
And, since we know that jobs are mostly bundles of skills, it would appear that getting a new job, or pivoting into a new field, isn’t nearly as hard as it appears.
